long_desc.thetext:
Releases retrieved: 1.22.1
Upstream release that is considered latest: 1.22.1
Current version/release in rawhide: 1.22.0-1.fc38
URL: https://syncthing.net/

Please consult the package updates policy before you issue an update to a stable branch: https://docs.fedoraproject.org/en-US/fesco/Updates_Policy/


More information about the service that created this bug can be found at: https://docs.fedoraproject.org/en-US/package-maintainers/Upstream_Release_Monitoring


Please keep in mind that with any upstream change, there may also be packaging changes that need to be made. Specifically, please remember that it is your responsibility to review the new version to ensure that the licensing is still correct and that no non-free or legally problematic items have been added upstream.


Based on the information from Anitya: https://release-monitoring.org/project/11814/


To change the monitoring settings for the project, please visit:
https://src.fedoraproject.org/rpms/syncthing

Syncthing 1.22.0 and 1.22.1 hold an annoying bug that causes lots of sync conflicts. This was fixed in later versions. See https://github.com/syncthing/syncthing/issues/8654 (Conflicts created on Android on files modified by other devices). I don't know if you are having holiday or there is trouble and stress in real life, but if you could manage somehow, please update and refrain from leaving us with this broken version of Syncthing. Thanks for maintaining Syncthing so far though. I am very grateful! :-)

Decathorpe reported build failures for 1.22.0 and 1.22.1 (https://github.com/syncthing/syncthing/issues/8601)
These buildfailures were adressed by Syncthing with release of 1.22.2
So, stop trying to build 1.22.0

comments.text: This update has been submitted for testing by decathorpe.
This update's test gating status has been changed to 'ignored'.
This update has been pushed to testing.
This update has been submitted for stable by bodhi.
This update has been pushed to stable.

notes:
Update to version 1.23.0.

Release notes: https://github.com/syncthing/syncthing/releases/tag/v1.23.0

Additionally, this update was built with a version of golang that addresses CVE-2022-41717, and it fixes the installation of icon files.
title: syncthing-1.23.0-2.fc37
